title: I think I'm starting to realize how ADC mains feel about now
body:
Been playing ADC for a few games now trying to get back into it.
Even if either ADC does well, it seems that they just melt in team fights instantly due to mobility creep, and I haven't seen a traditional support outside of a feeding Thresh in any of these games recently. Carries can't carry well anymore, I think that's the problem? I dunno, someone smarter than me explain it to me
